summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2263, for the improvement of Western Avenue, from the south margin of Virginia Street to the north margin of Eagle Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with vitrified brick or some other suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation; by constructing brick or stone gutters with granite or armored concrete curbs; providing for the construction or reconstruction of all sewers, side sewers and watermains, with their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage, drainage, water service and fire protection of said district. And by all necessary grading and regrading under Ordinance No. 23100 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
